Articles.Content:
Hi all,

 Does anyone know if it is known that fairings in fairings are not occluded? Drag indicators show that they still see the atmosphere when in another fairing..
Good question, and off hand I'm going to say that they probably aren't shielded. Possibly to prevent them from inadvertently shielding themselves. (But I'd have to look to be sure.)

3 hours ago, Claw said:

Good question, and off hand I'm going to say that they probably aren't shielded. Possibly to prevent them from inadvertently shielding themselves. (But I'd have to look to be sure.)

Thanks Claw I look forward to seeing what you discover.
Yo dawg, I herd you like fairings, so we put a fairing in your fairing so that that fairing in your fairing gets drag while in your fairing. Fairingception.
